children.tooltip: Expects an object such as: {"example":"some data"}
children.label: Bundle Metadata:

children.tooltip:
Creates an array of arrays for the given set of amount IDs separated with a semicolon (;) corresponding to each asset ID and they look as it follows:
10,20,30;100,200 => [[10,20,30],[100,200]]
children.label: Schema amounts:

children.tooltip:
Creates an array of arrays for the given set of asset IDs separated with a semicolon (;) corresponding to each class ID and they look as it follows:
1,2,3;1,2 => [[1,2,3],[1,2]]
children.label: Schema Asset IDs:

children.tooltip:
Creates an array using the class IDs provided as it follows:
1,2,3 => [1,2,3]
children.label: Schema Class ID:
